definition: to depend on/to comply with or listen to sb/according to/in the light of
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy

sentences.english: These results provided the genetic foundation for the breeding of V. volvacea.
sentences.chinese: 這些研究結果爲草菇的育種提供了科學依據。

sentences.english: We are the country with five-thousand-year culture, old buildings are one of the evidences.
sentences.chinese: 我們是用五千年文化的國家，舊建築物的依據之一。

sentences.english: It provided a reference for the quality control of the drug.
sentences.chinese: 爲該成藥質量控制研究提供了參考依據。

sentences.english: Can be based on specifications set the value to calculate the bending stress values.
sentences.chinese: 能，可依據規格設定值來計算出折曲壓力值。

sentences.english: The design bases of rapid determination meter photoelectricity system of pesticide residues were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了“殘留農藥速測儀”光電系統的設計依據。

sentences.english: The re-inspection will only be conducted to the sampled samples the re-inspection result shall be final.
sentences.chinese: 複驗只對抽取留存的樣品，複驗結果爲最終依據。

sentences.english: It depends on which country you are planning to go.
sentences.chinese: 考哪種試是得依據外國粹校的請求的。

sentences.english: The Works shall be measured, and valued for payment, in accordance with this Clause.
sentences.chinese: 應對工程依據本款進行測量並確定其支付價值。

sentences.english: The results provide theoretical basis for the exploitation and utilization of Herba junci setchuensis.
sentences.chinese: 研究結果爲龍鬚草的綜合開發利用提供了理論依據。

sentences.english: These results might provide a medical basis for the design of liquid-cooled helmet and cooling equipments.
sentences.chinese: 爲液冷頭盔及致冷裝置的設計，提供了醫學實驗依據。

sentences.english: The results of the appraisal shall be taken as the main basis for appointing or removing reserve officers.
sentences.chinese: 考覈結果作爲任免預備役軍官職務的主要依據。

sentences.english: All these studies form a test basis for the industrial production of the clay adsorption process.
sentences.chinese: 研究結果爲白土吸附的工業生產提供了試驗依據。

sentences.english: Bayerische Landesbank is a corporation established under the German public law.
sentences.chinese: 德國巴伐利亞州銀行是一家依據德國立法組建的銀行。

sentences.english: The paper can provide some academic bases for buffer technology to deal with non-point pollution.
sentences.chinese: 併爲緩衝帶技術處理面源污染，提供一定的理論依據。

sentences.english: It is arrange in pairs database of the field that make disambiguation do.
sentences.chinese: 並針對該領域建立了搭配知識庫，作爲消歧的依據。

sentences.english: Diagnosis of leakage was made by clinical features or abdominal CT-scans.
sentences.chinese: 吻合口瘻的診斷主要依據臨牀表現和腹部CT。

definition: to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
to target/to focus on/to be aimed at or against/in response to
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to correspond/answering (one another)/to agree (among the part)/corresponding/relevant/appropriate/(modify) accordingly
